Reviewing Link Properties

From the Link tab, you can edit the properties of the link or display the properties of the target folder or item in a read-only dialog.

To review link properties:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy or an item from the upper pane.

  2. Do one of the following:

    • For a folder, select Folder > Properties to display the Folder Properties dialog. Then click the Link tab.

    • For an item, select the Link tab from the lower pane.

    These actions display all links for the folder or item.

  3. Right-click a link, and select Link Properties from the context menu. The Link Properties dialog opens, allowing you to edit certain properties or add a comment.

To review the properties of a linked folder or item:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy or an item from the upper pane.

  2. Do one of the following:

    • For a folder, select Folder > Properties to display the Folder Properties dialog. Then click the Link tab.

    • For an item, select the Link tab from the lower pane.

  3. Do one of the following:

    • Right-click a link to open the Link context menu and select Item Properties to display a Properties dialog. This dialog displays information about the folder or item in the Item column on the Link tab.

    • Double-click a link from the Link tab to display the Properties dialog.

Note: Your ability to modify a link is governed by your access rights on the linked items. For operations that affect the link in general (such as Comment), you must have access rights to both items. For operations that affect only one end of the link, rights are required only for the item at that end.
